panels.description: Rate of total items collected by garbage collector every 10 mins
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Collection Rate

panels.description: Total rate of increase in items that cannot be collected by garbage collector over 10 minutes
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Uncollectable Items Rate

panels.description: Shows the trend of no. of workers currently running
panels.title: No. of Workers Trend

targets.expr: sum(rw_process_memory{container="service-worker", type="rss", job="aeo-metrics"}) by (pod)/sum(rw_process_memory{container="service-worker", type="max", job="aeo-metrics"}) by (pod) * 100

panels.description: Increase in items collected by garbage collector every 5 minutes per pod per generation
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Collected Objects Rate

panels.description: Increase in items that cannot be collected by garbage collector every 5 minutes per pod and generation
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Uncollectable Objects Rate

panels.description: Object collection rate by garbage collector over 10 minutes
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Collection Rate

panels.description: Rate of increase of uncollectable objects in garbage collector by generation (averaged to 10 m)
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Uncollectable Items Rate

targets.expr: sum(rw_process_memory{container="resource-worker", type="rss", job="aeo-metrics"}) by (pod)/sum(rw_process_memory{container="resource-worker", type="max", job="aeo-metrics"}) by (pod) * 100

panels.description: Increase in items collected by garbage collector every 5 minutes per pod per generation
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Collected Objects Rate

panels.description: Increase in items that cannot be collected by garbage collector every 5 minutes per pod and generation
panels.title: Garbage Collector: Uncollectable Objects Rate
